courseleaf.text:
Please note that the calendar below is subject to change. For the most up-to-date information, please see the official Academic Calendar, found on the Office of the Registrar's website .

Other important dates and deadlines can also be found on the Student Calendar .

Please also review Campus Guidelines andÂ Policies Concerning the Academic Calendar .

For further information regarding Reading/Review/Recitation week, please click here .

For Summer Sessions registration dates and deadlines, please see the Summer Sessions website .

Fall Semester 2015

Tele-BEARS BeginsMonday, April 6, 2015
Fee Payment DueSaturday, August 15, 2015
Fall Semester BeginsWednesday, August 19, 2015
Welcome Activities (Getting Your Bearings)Saturday, August 22, 2015-Saturday, September 12, 2015
Instruction BeginsWednesday, August 26, 2015
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Labor Day)Monday, September 7, 2015
HomecomingFriday, October 2, 2015-Sunday, October 4, 2015
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Veterans Day)Wednesday, November 11, 2015
Non-instructional DayWednesday, November 25, 2015
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Thanksgiving)Thursday, November 26, 2015-Friday, November 27, 2015
Classes EndFriday, December 4, 2015
Reading/Review/Recitation WeekMonday, December 7, 2015-Friday, December 11, 2015
Last Day of InstructionFriday, December 11, 2015
Final ExaminationsMonday, December 14, 2015-Friday, December 18, 2015
Fall Semester EndsFriday, December 18, 2015
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Winter Holiday)Thursday, December 24, 2015-Friday, December 25, 2015
Academic & Administrative Holiday (New Year's)Thursday, December 31, 2015-Thursday, January 1, 2016

Spring Semester 2016

Tele-BEARS BeginsMonday, October 19, 2015
Charter GalaTBD
Spring Semester BeginsTuesday, January 12, 2016
Fee Payment DueFriday, January 15, 2016
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Martin Luther King, Jr. Day)Monday, January 18, 2016
Instruction BeginsTuesday, January 19, 2016
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Presidents' Day)Monday, February 15, 2016
Spring RecessMonday, March 21, 2016-Friday, March 25, 2016
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Cesar Chavez Day)Friday, March 25, 2016
Cal DaySaturday, April 16, 2016
Classes EndFriday, April 29, 2016
Reading/Review/Recitation WeekMonday, May 2, 2016-Friday, May 6, 2016
Last Day of InstructionFriday, May 6, 2016
Final ExaminationsMonday, May 9, 2016-Friday, May 13, 2016
Spring Semester EndsFriday, May 13, 2016
CommencementSaturday, May 14, 2016
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Memorial Day)Monday, May 30, 2016

Summer Sessions 2016

First 6-week Session BeginsMonday, May 23, 2016
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Memorial Day)Monday, May 30, 2016
10-week Session BeginsMonday, June 6, 2016
8-week Session BeginsMonday, June 20, 2016
First 6-week Session EndsFriday, July 1, 2016
Academic & Administrative Holiday (Independence Day)Monday, July 4, 2016
Second 6-week Session BeginsMonday, July 5, 2016
3-week Session BeginsMonday, July 25, 2016
Second 6-week Session EndsFriday, August 12, 2016
10-week Session EndsFriday, August 12, 2016
8-week Session EndsFriday, August 12, 2016
3-week Session EndsFriday, August 12, 2016
